entries.journal_entry_description: Zhailaut has tasked you to recover a radio from a Trandoshan Camp deep in the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Down on level four the Trandoshans have set up a camp to herd the Feral Wookiees in the area. Infiltrate their camp and take the radio, then return to Zhailaut.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Return the captured radio to Zhailaut near the Kachiho gate in the Rryatt Trail.
